summary: When travel plans go awry, airline passengers may take out their frustrations on customer service agents. We surveyed 104 customer service agents. About half said passengers had verbally threatened them and 10% said passengers had physically assaulted them in the past year. We spoke with stakeholders (including prosecutors and airport police) who said current assault laws and law enforcement resources—primarily at the state and local...
title: Commercial Aviation: Information on Passenger Assaults against Airline Customer Service Agents at Airports
